text: Neu chung co i tham chien thi chung cung chang giup gi them cho cac nguoi, nguoc lai, chung chi lam roi loan hang ngu bang cach lang xang chay qua chay lai giua cac nguoi e xui giuc ke khac lam loan va trong cac nguoi co mot so tin o nghe theo chung; nhung Allah biet ro nhung nguoi lam ieu sai quay
